---
pagetitle: CSS Selectors - ID
example:
  title: CSS Selectors - ID
  instructions: |-
    Change the background color of the element with `id="shiny"` to blue:

    ```
    background-color: #4d8dc9;
    ```
  runtime: repl
  mode:
    document: html
  initial:
    js: ~
    css: ~
  solution:
    js: ~
    css: |-
      #shiny {
        background-color: #4d8dc9;
      }
output: js4shiny::html_document_js4shiny

<div><!--for pandoc-->
<section id="shiny">

  <p>

  </p>
  <p style="color: white;">
    Good job!
  </p>
</div>

</div><!--for pandoc-->
